segments.text: Wow , there are so many lanterns to appreciate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now . you can see why it's called the Lantern Festival .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you notice the characters on the lanterns ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But you know that I can't read any Chinese characters . What do they say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are puzzles . It's a tradition to solve the puzzles on the lanterns during the Lantern Festival .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's interesting and I want to buy one home .
segments.speaker: S1
